name: Endless Dungeon Run
description:
You are a mighty warrior who wants to gain wealth, experience and might. To archive this goal, you decided to enter the "Endless Dungeon".

This dungeon, feared by every living soul, will continue forever and will provide you with an endless supply of monster which are getting stronger and stronger.

Especially your unique power which allows you to resurrect in the city after you died will become very useful, therefor you can claim all your gold for slaying these monster in the dungeon and improve your abilities for your next run.

Have fun with this endless dungeon runner and click through all the various monster you will find there. 

------------------------------------------------------------

Controls: 

  • Click to attack and block
  • Spend your experience points for short time improvements during the dungeon run
  • Gain Gold after resurrected in the city to improve your attributes permanently
  • The Game is saved after every purchase in the city and after dying in the dungeon

------------------------------------------------------------

Cheats: 

This Game contains Cheats. It will kill all the fun in playing the game for real, but can grant some fun to just rush through all the enemies. 

  • Left Shift + Attack Click ==> Attack 10 Times with only one Click
  • F10 ==> Opens the Cheatmenu to manipulate your attributes in the dungeon or city

------------------------------------------------------------
